snippet: Over time, it's extremely difficult to beat market indexes, you won't be able to predict who will do it in the future and hot streaks can come to an end. Still want to pick stocks?
abstract: Over time, it's extremely difficult to beat market indexes, you won't be able to predict who will do it in the future and hot streaks can come to an end. Still want to pick stocks?

headline.main: It's Probably Not Going to Be You Who Beats the Market
